page.title: 12A PRIMARY SCHOOL DAY
page.content: {Knockahollet Primary School}begins at 09.10 each day - Monday to Friday. The first subject is{Religious Education,} consisting of hymns and Bible Study. {Maths and English,}the main subjects, take up most of the mornings. Other subjects,such as{History, Geography and{Science}are taught, but not every day. All the pupils read lots of books and learn to sing, while the older boys and girls play musical instruments. All pupils do{Physical Education}which includes swimming for 9 to 11 year olds in the Riada Pool, Ballymoney. There is a 10 minute break at 10.45, and a lunch period from 12.15 to 13.00 hrs. School ends at 15.00 hrs.
